author: Chris Tomlinson, Chris Tomlinson
title: Europol: Criminals Adapting and Taking Advantage of Coronavirus Outbreak
description: The European Union police agency Europol has released a report claiming that criminals are adapting and taking advantage of the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak through cybercrime, fraud, and counterfeit medical goods.
content:
The European Union police agency Europol has released a report claiming that criminals are adapting and taking advantage of the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak through cybercrime, fraud, and counterfeit medical goods.
The agency stated in their March 2020 report … [+1992 chars]
